LanguageData.Artillery_Mortar.label: mortar
LanguageData.Artillery_Mortar.description: Mortar launcher. Lobs bombs over walls. Very inaccurate but long-ranged.
LanguageData.Artillery_Mortar.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: mortar
LanguageData.Bullet_AutocannonTurret.label: autocannon shell
LanguageData.Bullet_MiniTurret.label: mini-turret bullet
LanguageData.Bullet_TurretSniper.label: uranium slug
LanguageData.Gun_AutocannonTurret.label: autocannon
LanguageData.Gun_AutocannonTurret.description: A self-loading large-bore cannon designed to attach to a turret.
LanguageData.Gun_MiniTurret.label: mini-turret gun
LanguageData.Gun_MiniTurret.description: A simple automatic gun made to be mounted on a turret.
LanguageData.Gun_MiniTurret.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: mini-turret gun
LanguageData.Gun_RocketswarmLauncher.label: rocketswarm tube
LanguageData.Gun_RocketswarmLauncher.description: A rocketswarm tube of the type usually mounted on a rocketswarm launcher turret.
LanguageData.Gun_TurretFoam.label: foam sprayer
LanguageData.Gun_TurretFoam.description: A high-pressure firefoam sprayer usually mounted on a turret.
LanguageData.Gun_TurretSniper.label: uranium slug cannon
LanguageData.Gun_TurretSniper.description: A self-loading uranium slug cannon designed to attach to a turret.
LanguageData.Gun_TurretSniper.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: uranium slug cannon
LanguageData.Proj_Foam.label: foam
LanguageData.Proj_Rocket.label: rocket
LanguageData.Turret_Autocannon.label: autocannon turret
LanguageData.Turret_Autocannon.description: A heavy automatic turret. Its large-caliber shells do heavy damage over significant ranges, but its barrel must be refurbished after use. It cannot fire at close-up targets, and may explode when damaged.
LanguageData.Turret_FoamTurret.label: foam turret
LanguageData.Turret_FoamTurret.description: An activatable turret for extinguishing fires. The turret stands idle until someone approaches and activates it, after which it will automatically spray large amounts of firefoam on any flames in sight.
LanguageData.Turret_MiniTurret.label: mini-turret
LanguageData.Turret_MiniTurret.description: A portable automatic turret. Requires steel to refurbish its barrel after heavy use. May explode when damaged. Its dumb AI brain can't be directly controlled, so beware of friendly fire.
LanguageData.Turret_Mortar.label: mortar
LanguageData.Turret_Mortar.description: A manned mortar that launches all kinds of shells. While it can inflict devastating damage, the mortar's inherent inaccuracy makes it more useful for attacking large fortifications than groups of enemies in the field.
LanguageData.Turret_RocketswarmLauncher.label: rocketswarm launcher
LanguageData.Turret_RocketswarmLauncher.description: An emergency-defense launcher that fires a single barrage of rockets covering a large area. The turret does not fire until someone activates it. It is very effective against large groups of weaker combatants, but less effective against small numbers of armored targets. Once fired, it must cool off for hours and be reloaded to fire again.
LanguageData.Turret_Sniper.label: uranium slug turret
LanguageData.Turret_Sniper.description: An armor-piercing turret. Its ultra-dense uranium shells can punch through heavy armor, but it requires new uranium slugs to be loaded after use. It's more accurate at longer ranges, and can't fire at all close up. May explode when damaged.
